backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that manages chunked image uploads via session tracking, assembles chunks, applies a placeholder enhancement, stores images by ID, and exposes query methods to retrieve images and their IDs.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature IDs to their titles, associated source files, component dependencies, and test IDs for features like blur removal, canvas upscaling, and image adjustment sliders.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and key details of each module.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component implementing an upload/processing/done/error state machine, storing raw file bytes for chunked upload, and orchestrating the image enhancement flow with progress tracking and mode selection.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Presentational hero banner component displaying a background image with gradient overlays, the app logo, and amber-styled PixelBoost branding and tagline.
Side-by-side image comparison component that upscales the enhanced image via canvas, applies real-time adjustments (brightness, contrast, saturation, sharpness, crop, rotation), and renders a crop overlay UI with the ImageEnhancementControls panel.
frontend/src/components/ImageEnhancement: React component that renders a panel of image enhancement sliders (brightness, contrast, saturation, sharpness, noise reduction, rotation) plus crop and download action buttons, with reset functionality.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploader.ts: React component providing a drag-and-drop or click-to-browse file upload zone for JPEG/PNG images, with preview display, validation, and reset capability.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCropSelection.ts: Custom hook managing interactive crop-rectangle selection on a canvas overlay, handling mouse events and scaling between display pixels and natural image pixels.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, identity state, and status flags to React components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom hook exposing a React Query mutation that uploads an image to the ICP backend in chunked segments, triggers enhancement, and returns a blob URL of the enhanced result with progress reporting.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a dark charcoal/amber OKLCH color theme with custom utility classes for glows, gradients, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/imageProcessing.ts: Canvas-based image processing utilities providing functions for upscaling, convolution kernels, brightness/contrast, saturation, sharpening, noise reduction, and crop/rotate operations on ImageData pixel arrays.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH-based color tokens (amber, charcoal, sidebar), custom fonts, border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking the app's version, summary, architectural notes, and a list of implemented features for a client-side photo enhancement app with canvas-based editing tools.
